org.apache.flink.graph.spargel.ScatterFunction

    • org.apache.flink.graph中ScatterFunction的使用

      参数类型为ScatterFunction的org.apache.flink.graph中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Runs a ScatterGather iteration on the graph.
      <M> Graph<K,VV,EV> Graph.runScatterGatherIteration(ScatterFunction<K,VV,M,EV> scatterFunction, GatherFunction<K,VV,M> gatherFunction, int maximumNumberOfIterations, ScatterGatherConfiguration parameters)
      Runs a ScatterGather iteration on the graph with configuration options.

    • org.apache.flink.graph.library中ScatterFunction的使用

      org.apache.flink.graph.library中ScatterFunction的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  CommunityDetection.LabelMessenger<K> 
      static class  ConnectedComponents.CCMessenger<K,VV extends Comparable<VV>>
      Sends the current vertex value to all adjacent vertices.
      static class  LabelPropagation.SendNewLabelToNeighbors<K,VV extends Comparable<VV>>
      Sends the vertex label to all out-neighbors
      static class  PageRank.RankMessenger<K>
      Distributes the rank of a vertex among all target vertices according to the transition probability, which is associated with an edge as the edge value.
      static class  SingleSourceShortestPaths.MinDistanceMessenger<K>
      Distributes the minimum distance associated with a given vertex among all the target vertices summed up with the edge's value.

    • org.apache.flink.graph.spargel中ScatterFunction的使用

      参数类型为ScatterFunction的org.apache.flink.graph.spargel中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static <K,VV,Message,EV>
      ScatterGatherIteration<K,VV,Message,EV>      		 ScatterGatherIteration.withEdges(org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<Edge<K,EV>> edgesWithValue, ScatterFunction<K,VV,Message,EV> sf, GatherFunction<K,VV,Message> gf, int maximumNumberOfIterations)
      Creates a new scatter-gather iteration operator for graphs where the edges are associated with a value (such as a weight or distance).
